wmndsBannerProps.name: contentText
wmndsBannerProps.description: Required. Specifies the content that will be part of the banner. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsBannerProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsBannerProps.description: Required. Uses HTML to specify what content is to be shown in the banner.

wmndsBannerProps.name: emergency
wmndsBannerProps.description: If set to true the banner will display in the emergency style

wmndsBannerProps.name: onPage
wmndsBannerProps.description: If set to true the on page variant of the banner will display.

wmndsBannerProps.name: phase
wmndsBannerProps.description: If set to true the banner will display the phase indicator.

wmndsBannerProps.name: phaseText
wmndsBannerProps.description: Text to show in the phase indicator
